name: The Juggler (Gabriel Naves)
description:
Juggle the balls and use them to hit the rings! The balls will be thrown in the direction of the mouse, try hitting as many rings as you can before time runs out!

A quick prototype I created for Ludum Dare 49. Did you think that the mechanic of moving with the keyboard and "juggling" (directing the balls) with the mouse can work on a more realized game? I'd love to hear it! Didn't like it at all? That's okay too. :)
